posts.headline: Met on the L Train
posts.encounter: Hey, You were a short blonde girl who was from Greece, but is actually from France.  It's been a while. Not sure if you see this, if you do get in touch.

posts.headline: Met on the L Train
posts.encounter: Hey, You brown and all that.  Sup.  Skin smooth.

posts.headline: Coffee Meets Bagel
posts.encounter: I've traveled to New Zealand.  It was cool.
